revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot
revision.text: {{Skip to talk}} {{Talk header}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Caribbean|class=B|importance=Low}} {{WikiProject Cuba|importance=Mid|class=B}} {{WikiProject Military history|class=Start |B-Class-1=no |B-Class-2=yes |B-Class-3=yes |B-Class-4=yes |B-Class-5=yes |Latin-American=yes }} }} {{Not a forum}} == Background == I removed background because it was completely irrelevant and obvious. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/89.127.240.77|89.127.240.77]] ([[User talk:89.127.240.77|talk]]) 14:27, 29 May 2009 (UTC) == More information needed == Hi, it would be great if this article could be expanded a little. I'm currently rather mystified as to how a force of about 340 guerrillas defeated a defending force 10 times their size. Did most of the Government troops simply sit on their hands during the battle and do no fighting? Is that why the rebels won? This article is silent on that - it would be useful if someone could do a bit of research. Cheers. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/93.174.8.253|93.174.8.253]] ([[User talk:93.174.8.253|talk]]) 08:59, 20 July 2009 (UTC) "Did most of the Government troops simply sit on their hands during the battle and do no fighting?" They did do fighting but when push came to shove they would scatter. They weren't fighting for anything they believed in, just a crappy wage. Revolutionaries were fighting for no wage, thus they very willing to fight and die. A battle of wills. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/121.216.55.13|121.216.55.13]] ([[User talk:121.216.55.13|talk]]) 03:45, 30 August 2011 (UTC) == "armoured" train? == Just a comment, but based on the photographs provided of a carriage from the "armoured train", it appears not to be a true [[armoured train]], but a normal goods car with [[loophole]]s cut in the walls. -- [[Special:Contributions/202.63.39.58|202.63.39.58]] ([[User talk:202.63.39.58|talk]]) 11:41, 14 October 2009 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Battle of Santa Clara]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=700402205 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20070627094946/http://www.swl.net:80/patepluma/central/cuba/rebel2.html to http://www.swl.net/patepluma/central/cuba/rebel2.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know. {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 08:32, 18 January 2016 (UTC)
